detaileddescription.para: Helper macros to log usign different levels.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* sbfLogHookCb) (sbfLog log, sbfLogLevel level, const char *message, void *closure)
memberdef.argsstring: )(sbfLog log, sbfLogLevel level, const char *message, void *closure)
memberdef.name: sbfLogHookCb

briefdescription.para: This callback is invoked when hook is set to the log system to intercept logging messages.

parameterdescription.para: the user data linked to the log's hook.

simplesect.para: 1 to skip the log, other value to continue.

briefdescription.para: Creates a log through a formatted string.

parameterdescription.para: the list of arguments for the formatted string.

briefdescription.para: Releases all the resources allocated by the log's handler.
Converts from string level into level code. In the case that level string is not defined then SBF_LOG_OFF will be returned.

parameterdescription.para: null terminated string containing the log level.

simplesect.para: the level code from a given null terminated string level.

briefdescription.para: Converts from a code level into null terminated string level.

simplesect.para: null terminated string containing the level.

memberdef.argsstring: (sbfLog log, sbfLogLevel level, const char *fmt,...) SBF_PRINTFLIKE(3
memberdef.name: sbfLog_log

briefdescription.para: Logs a message with a given level into the logging system.

parameterdescription.para: the parameters for the formatting string.

memberdef.argsstring: (sbfLog log, sbfLogLevel level, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
memberdef.name: sbfLog_vlog

briefdescription.para: Logs a message with a given level into the logging system.

parameterdescription.para: the list of arguments for the formatting string.

memberdef.argsstring: (sbfLog log, sbfLogLevel level, void *buf, size_t len)
memberdef.name: sbfLog_logData

briefdescription.para: Logs a chunk of binary data with a given level into the logging system.

parameterdescription.para: the size of the data in bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (sbfLog log, sbfLogLevel level, sbfLogHookCb cb, void *closure)
memberdef.name: sbfLog_setHook

briefdescription.para: Sets a hook to the logging system to intercept the writing of log messages.

parameterdescription.para: the callback to be invoked before the log is applied.
the user data linked to the hook.

briefdescription.para: This file declares the structures and functions of a log system.
